review: We are very pleased with the Fire TV Stick  .  We can now watch so many programs at any time we want. We may even consider dropping our cable subscription which will save us some money.
author: Ms. Anna Albers

review: Easy to install, responds quickly to demands and is an excellent buy.  Highly recommend!
author: Jerry

review: Animations make me a little dissy.
author: Michael

review: Easy to hook-up and easy to use.  Greta way to get the most out of your Prime membership.  Beats using smart tv or even gaming systems functions to navigate.
author: Brent Alan Clark

review: Good product. Much faster/better interface than the one built into my dvd/blueray player. HD videos. Sometimes cant connect to wifi which is only 1 room away and my phone stays connected.
author: Robert Evans

review: Slow! Waste of money! Chromecast is much better.  Video feed lags & loses connection frequently throughout watching movies or Netflix
author: Sean walker

review: Looking forward to exploring even more.
author: Tina Hoagland
